profile.profileDescription: Profile for the INBO natural science collection

label.name: Objects higher hiÃ«rarchy: relevant groupings of NS objects
Parent type on which the sampling was execute

label.name_singular: no indication of being currently reproductive
label.name_plural: no indication of being currently reproductive

label.name_singular: Aangetast hoogveen waar herstel nog mogelijk is (7120)
label.name_plural: Aangetast hoogveen waar herstel nog mogelijk is (7120)

label.name_singular: Droge kalkgraslanden en struweel op kalkbodem (6210)
label.name_plural: Droge kalkgraslanden en struweel op kalkbodem (6210)

label.name_singular: Eiken-Beukenbossen met Wilde hyacint en Parelgras-Beukenbossen (9130)
label.name_plural: Eiken-Beukenbossen met Wilde hyacint en Parelgras-Beukenbossen (9130)

label.name_singular: Eiken-Beukenbossen en Eiken-Berkenbossen op zure bodems (9120_9190)
label.name_plural: Eiken-Beukenbossen en Eiken-Berkenbossen op zure bodems (9120_9190)

label.name_singular: restriction in reuse of generated objects
label.name_plural: restriction in reuse of generated objects

label.name: Barcode
label.description: A unique identifier within INBO that is more easily human readable, e.g. INBO-ZADEN-0000-000-001.

label.name: remarks
label.description: Comments or notes

label.name: Georeference Result
label.description: Coordinates and map visualizing the location.

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of description. Preferable refer to a DOI.

label.name: File
label.description: File linked to the storage location (e.g. map), administration (e.g. permit), ...

label.name: Date (range) and time (range)
label.description: Represents an historic date range accepting date/time range expressions in the formats acceptedby the CA TimeExpressionParser module.

label.name: Blocked Until
label.description: Sample or specimen data can not be ordered/loaned until the given date, but are visible via portals

label.name: verbatimEventDate
label.description: The verbatim original representation of the date and time information for an Event.

label.name: dateTimeRemarks
label.description: Comments or notes on the date and/or time.

label.name: verbatimLocality
label.description: The original textual description of the place.

label.name: verbatimCoordinates
label.description: The verbatim original spatial coordinates of the Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in verbatimCoordinateSystem.

label.name: verbatimCoordinateSystem
label.description: The coordinate format for the verbatimLatitude and verbatimLongitude or the verbatimCoordinates of the Location.

label.name: verbatimSRS
label.description: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which coordinates given in verbatimLatitude and verbatimLongitude, or verbatimCoordinates are based.

label.name: verbatimElevation
label.description: The original description of the elevation (altitude, usually above sea level) of the Location.

label.name: verbatimDepth
label.description: The original description of the depth below the local surface.

label.name: habitat
label.description: A category or description of the habitat in which the Event occurred.

label.name: placeRemarks
label.description: Comments or notes on locality/place.

label.name: verbatimIdentification
label.description: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record. This can be scientific names at any level (species, genus, family, ..), vernacular names, expressions with taxon qualifiers (aff., cf.) or other expressions of doubt.

label.name: lastIdentification
label.description: Last identification (standardised) executed on the observation. Assumed to be most likely the correct identification.

label.name: eventProcedure
label.description: Description of the procedure that took place (e.g. the measurement procedure, sampling procedure, identification procedure, ...)

label.name: executionRemarks
label.description: Comments or notes on the execution of the event.

label.name: samplingParentType
label.description: Type of 'thing' the sample was taken from.

label.name: sex
label.description: The sex of the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence.

label.name: lifeStage
label.description: The age class or life stage of the biological individual(s) at the time the Occurrence was recorded.

label.name: reproductiveCondition
label.description: The reproductive condition of the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

label.name: behavior
label.description: A description of the behavior shown by the subject at the time the Occurrence was recorded. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

label.name: establishmentMeans
label.description: The process by which the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence became established at the location. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

label.name: measurementType
label.description: A further specification of the measurement, e.g. length.. of the tail.

label.name: Ratio of Absorbance 260/230 (DNA)
label.description: Ratio of absorbance at 260 nm and 230 nm assessing DNA purity (mostly secondary measure, indicates mainly EDTA, carbohydrates, phenol), (DNA samples only)

label.name: Ratio of Absorbance 260/280 (DNA)
label.description: Ratio of absorbance at 280 nm and 230 nm assessing DNA purity (mostly secondary measure, indicates mainly EDTA, carbohydrates, phenol), (DNA samples only)

label.name: concentrationUnit
label.description: The units associated with the concentration measurement.

label.name: measurementValue
label.description: The value of the measurement

label.name: lengthUnit
label.description: The units associated with the length measurement.

label.name: volumeUnit
label.description: The units associated with the volume measurement.

label.name: weightUnit
label.description: The units associated with the weight measurement.

label.name: fragmentLength
label.description: Length of fragments (on average or precise)

label.name: measurementAccuracy
label.description: The description of the potential error associated with the measurementValue.

label.name: identificationQualifier
label.description: A brief phrase or a standard term (cf., aff.) to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification.

label.name: scientificName
label.description: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the IdentificationQualifier term.

label.name: scientificName
label.description: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the IdentificationQualifier term.

label.name: Arguments for object value
label.description: Arguments for object value

label.name: obligationType
label.description: Type of obligation

label.name: obligationdeadline
label.description: Specify if there is a deadline. Examples: "2026", "2026-12-12", "no deadline", "asap".

label.name: obligationStatus
label.description: Status of meeting the obligation

label.name: statusDate
label.description: Date at which current status was achieved.

label.name: obligationDocumentation
label.description: File that proves that the obligation was met.

label.name: RORID
label.description: Research Organization Registry (ROR) identification

label.name: WikidataID
label.description: Wikidata identification

label.name: ORCID
label.description: ORCID

label.name: gettyID
label.description: Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names

label.name: GRSciColl
label.description: Global Registry of Scientific Collections

label.name: samplingEffort
label.description: The amount of effort expended during an Event.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan renewal application date
label.description: The date to apply for a renewal to the loan.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan note
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

settings.setting: Object record name (= short human understandable description)
Barcode or identifier on object (e.g. field ID)
Type of the parent of which the sample is made

<unit> <l>ID:^ca_occurrences.idno</l>, DateTime: ^ca_occurrences.dateRange, <ifdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Scientific name: ^ca_occurrences.lastIdentification, </ifdef> <ifnotdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Verbatim identification: ^ca_occurrences.verbatimIdentification, </ifnotdef> Verbatim Locality: ^ca.occurrences.verbatimLocality </unit>
The object is a subsample of

<unit relativeTo="ca_occurrence" restrictToTypes="observation"> <l>ID:^ca_occurrences.idno</l>, DateTime: ^ca_occurrences.dateRange, Verbatim Locality: ^ca.occurrences.verbatimLocality, <ifdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Scientific name: ^ca_occurrences.lastIdentification, </ifdef> <ifnotdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Verbatim identification: ^ca_occurrences.verbatimIdentification, </ifnotdef> </unit>
The object is a sample of

<unit relativeTo="ca_occurrence" restrictToTypes="observation"> <l>ID:^ca_occurrences.idno</l>, DateTime: ^ca_occurrences.dateRange, <ifdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Scientific name: ^ca_occurrences.lastIdentification, </ifdef> <ifnotdef code="ca_occurrences.lastIdentification"> Verbatim identification: ^ca_occurrences.verbatimIdentification, </ifnotdef> Verbatim Locality: ^ca.occurrences.verbatimLocality </unit>
Sampling event that lead to object
The last result of the identification events linkd to the observation, standardised.
From the object, subsample is taken

Date (range) and time (range) of event, standardised.
The original description of a place
The original description of the coordinates
The identification of the observation, not standardised.
Type of the parent on which the sampling is executed
Sample from Natural Science object lot
Any remaining notes or remarks on the event.
The original representation of the date (range) and time (range)
Date (range) and time (range) of event, standardised.
Remarks regarding the date/time, as originally recorded.
The original description of a place
The original description of the coordinates
The coordinate system of the original coordinates
The spatial reference system of the original coordinates
The original description of the elevation
The original description of the depth.
Remarks regarding the place/location, as originally recorded.
The identification of the observation, not standardised.
The last result of the identification events linkd to the observation, standardised.
Type of the parent on which the sampling is executed
Sample from Natural Science object lot
Documented procedure (e.g. article, SOP, identification key)
If no reference: short description of procedure (if relevant)
Any remarks on execution of procedure (e.g. deviations, uncertainties)
Extra information describing the checked arguments (e.g. explain: "rare" for your object (lot))
Further specification on the type of measurement
Any remaining notes or remarks on the event.
Address for sending communications by letter.
Any remaining notes or remarks on the entity.
Any remaining notes or remarks on the place.
Add official collection name in another language
Any remaining notes or remarks on the collection

<unit> <l>ID: ^ca_occurrences.idno</l>, Date: ^ca_occurrences.dateRange, Scientific name:<ifdef code="identificationQualifier"> ^ca_occurrences.identificationQualifier </ifdef> ^ca_occurrences.scientificName, <unit relativeTo="ca_entities">IDed by: ^ca_entities.preferred_labels.displayname</unit></unit>
Files associated with object lot (e.g. map, form)

<unit> <l>ID: ^ca_occurrences.idno</l>, Date: ^ca_occurrences.dateRange, Scientific name:<ifdef code="identificationQualifier"> ^ca_occurrences.identificationQualifier </ifdef> ^ca_occurrences.scientificName, <unit relativeTo="ca_entities">IDed by: ^ca_entities.preferred_labels.displayname</unit></unit>
The object lot (data) resulted in dataset
The object lot (data) resulted in literature
Sampling effort: representative of true population?
Notes or remarks on the object lot
Any remaining notes or remarks on the object lot
Add remark on the object lot
Any remaining notes or remarks on the loan
Add remark on the object loan

role.name: Administrators
role.description: Confers actions needed by those administering the system

role.name: Cataloguers
role.description: Confers actions needed by those editing catalogue entries

role.name: Researcher
role.description: Allows users to only search and view - but not edit - catalogue entries

role.name: User content moderator
role.description: Allows users to moderate user generated tags and comments

group.name: Cataloguers
group.description: Users who can add and edit catalogue entries
